## BitMatrix.at() method

Returns a non-zero value if bit at `m,n` is enabled (row major). No bounds checking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
at(m: number, n: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m | <code>number</code> | row |
|  n | <code>number</code> | column |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
